name: BelfastCityAirport
0:
”Alexa, open Belfast City Airport”
”Alexa, ask Belfast City Airport for Flight Arrivals”
”Alexa, ask Belfast City Airport for Flight Departures”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: belfast city airport
des:
Find the latest flight updates for flights departing or arriving at George Best Belfast City Airport – the UK and Ireland's most convenient airport.
 
With the Belfast City Airport skill for Alexa, you can not only ask for latest flight updates, but you can also ask for information on airport parking at Belfast City Airport or how to book the airport lounge or fast track security passes.
 
Use this skill to learn more about Belfast City Airport, which now flies to 26 destinations across the UK and Europe.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
